svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(230, 208, 222), rgb(230, 208, 222)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(0, 0, 0));

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(0, 0, 0)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(0, 0, 0));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(0, 0, 0)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(0, 0, 0));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(153, 153, 153), rgb(153, 153, 153)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(26, 26, 26), rgb(26, 26, 26));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 47px; margin-left: 138px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #000000); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(0, 0, 0)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(0, 0, 0));
